song.englishname: Let My Love Open The Door

english.segment1: When people keep repeating. That you'll never fall in love. When everybody keeps retreating. But you can't seem to get enough
english.segment2: . Chorus. Let my love open the door. Let my love open the door. Let my love open the door. To your heart
english.segment3: . When everything feels all over. When everybody seems unkind. I'll give you a four leaf clover. Take all the worry out of your mind
english.segment5: . I have the only key to your heart. I can stop you falling apart. Try today, you'll find this way. Come one and give me a chance to say. Let my love open the door. It's all i'm living for. Release yourself from misery. Only thing's gonna set you free. That's my love
english.segment7: . When tragedy befalls you. Don't let them bring you down. Love can cure your problems. You're so lucky i'm around
